info.title: Script Rating API
info.description: API for rating and analyzing scripts using clean architecture

get.description:
Basic health check endpoint.

Returns:
    dict: Health status information.

Readiness check endpoint for load balancer health checks.

Returns:
    dict: Readiness status information.

Get all scripts.

Returns:
    List[dict]: List of script dictionaries.

post.description:
Create a new script.

Returns:
    dict: Placeholder response for script creation.

get.description:
Get a specific script by ID.

Args:
    script_id: The unique identifier of the script.

Returns:
    dict: Placeholder response for script retrieval.

post.description: Upload script or criteria documents. Criteria files are indexed into the knowledge base.

get.description: Retrieve metadata for an uploaded document.

delete.description: Delete an uploaded document and its associated data.

get.description: Get a list of all uploaded documents.

post.description: Initiate analysis of an uploaded script document.

get.description: Check the status and progress of a script analysis.
Retrieve the complete results of a script analysis.

post.description: Submit user feedback to correct analysis results.

get.description: Retrieve details of submitted feedback.

delete.description: Delete submitted feedback and revert rating changes.

get.description: Retrieve all feedback submitted for a specific analysis.
Get a list of all submitted feedback.

post.description: Generate a report for a completed analysis in the specified format.

get.description: Download a generated report file.
Retrieve metadata for a generated report.
Get a list of all generated reports.

post.description: Query the RAG system for relevant legal and reference content.
Add new content to the RAG knowledge corpus.

get.description: Get a list of documents in the RAG corpus.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of documents to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of documents to return

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific corpus document.

delete.description: Remove a document from the RAG corpus.

get.description: Get a list of recent RAG queries and their results.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of queries to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of queries to return

get.description: Get statistical information about the RAG system.

Get list of available LLM providers.

Returns:
    LLMProvidersListResponse: List of providers and active provider.

Get list of available LLM models.

Returns:
    LLMModelsListResponse: List of models grouped by provider.

Get current LLM configuration.

Returns:
    LLMConfigResponse: Current configuration including providers and models.

put.description:
Update LLM configuration.

Args:
    config_update: Configuration update request.

Returns:
    LLMConfigResponse: Updated configuration.

get.description:
Check status of LLM provider.

Args:
    provider: Provider to check status for.

Returns:
    LLMStatusResponse: Status information including health and response time.

Check status of all LLM providers.

Returns:
    List[LLMStatusResponse]: Status information for all providers.

schema.title: Response Get All Llm Status Api V1 Llm Status Get

post.description:
Test LLM with a prompt.

Args:
    test_request: Test request with prompt and optional model.

Returns:
    LLMTestResponse: Test results including response and metadata.

get.description:
Get list of available local models with their info.

Returns:
    LocalModelsListResponse: List of local models and loaded models.

Get detailed information about a specific local model.

Args:
    model_name: Name of the model to get info for.

Returns:
    LocalModelInfo: Detailed model information.

Get list of available OpenRouter models.

Returns:
    OpenRouterModelsListResponse: List of available models.

post.description:
Make a call to OpenRouter API.

Args:
    request: OpenRouter call request.

Returns:
    OpenRouterCallResponse: API call response.

get.description:
Check OpenRouter API connectivity and status.

Returns:
    OpenRouterStatusResponse: API status information.

Get performance metrics for a specific provider.

Args:
    provider: LLM provider to get metrics for.
    time_range: Time range for the report (1h, 24h, 7d, 30d).

Returns:
    PerformanceReportResponse: Performance metrics report.

Get performance metrics for all providers.

Args:
    time_range: Time range for the reports (1h, 24h, 7d, 30d).

Returns:
    List[PerformanceReportResponse]: Performance reports for all providers.

schema.title: Response Get All Performance Reports Api V1 Llm Performance Get

get.description:
Get enhanced status information for a provider including performance metrics.

Args:
    provider: Provider to check status for.

Returns:
    LLMStatusResponse: Enhanced status information.

put.description:
Switch between local and API modes with model selection.

Args:
    provider: Provider to switch to.
    model_name: Model name to activate.

Returns:
    LLMConfigResponse: Updated configuration.

get.description:
Get overall health summary of LLM system.

Returns:
    Dict: Health summary including all providers and models.

post.description:
Load a local model into memory.

Args:
    request: Load model request with model name.

Returns:
    LocalModelInfo: Updated model information.

Unload a local model from memory.

Args:
    request: Unload model request with model name.

Returns:
    LocalModelInfo: Updated model information.
